places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Clarks Inn
address: Jaggi city centre, Jammu - Delhi Rd, 9Q9X+6W7, Model Town Rd, Sena Nagar, Dholkot, Crossing, Ambala Cantt, Haryana 133001, India

reviews.text:
My family and I found ourselves in an incredibly tough spot one night due to dense fog, zero visibility, and extreme cold. Desperate for shelter and safety, we approached this hotel, hoping for a warm room to protect our kids and ourselves.

However, despite the late hour and the emergency situation, we were turned away because of their policy against allowing a couple with two kids to share a room. It was heartbreaking and frustrating to be denied accommodation when we needed it the most.

We understand policies exist for reasons, but in moments of crisis and urgency, we expected a bit of compassion and understanding. We were left outside, shivering in the bitter cold, feeling utterly abandoned by an establishment that valued rules over human well-being.

I urge this hotel to reconsider its policies or at least have some flexibility for emergencies. No family should ever be denied a room when seeking refuge in such dire conditions. This experience was not just disappointing but also deeply upsetting.

But it is not expected from the Clarks. Hopefully, I will update my review if I get better food on my next visit.
